channel.title: Control Drafts macOS with the keyboard only
channel.description:
If you like to control your apps, such as drafts, only with the keyboard, you will soon reach your limits. My tip here is the free App [Vimac](https://vimacapp.com).
In the video a short example how I use Drafts on the Mac:
https://d.pr/v/CPSxqr
A description of how to use the Vimac App shortcuts can be found here:
https://github.com/dexterleng/vimac/
